TopicTitle: How do you get stock parts without re downloading the game.

Articles.Content: I have the game put a whole bunch of part packs on it. When I deleted them I deleted the stock parts too so can you help me I cant even start ksp without parts.;.;
Hi Wazup, if you don't still have your zip file you will have to re-download the game, either the demo from the main download page, or the full game from your store download page.

If you bought the game legitimately, there's really no reason you can't log into the store, go to your profile, and redownload it.

However posting paid version game files and parts is a no no, so redownloading it from the store is about your only option.

it should be noted that after you buy it once.. you don't have to buy it again to download it. just look in your profile in the store.

Edited October 13, 2012 by Qumefox
It's worth trying to patcher to see if it can restore just those files.

Yeah the patcher should work for this, I have had mixed results though.

You will need to download the patcher from the store, unzip it and place the patcher.exe file and patcher_data folder in your KSP folder, then run the patcher.exe directly.

It will ask for you store login, then you can do a Repair of KSP.
Hmm, not sure on how reliable the Repair option is. I have a full working version of 0.17, and the patcher wants me to Repair 500-ish files... even though I'm 99% sure it doesn't need to.
